New Records: Bolivia secured a 1-0 win against Colombia, ending a 31-year away win drought in World Cup qualifiers.
Miguel Terceros scored his third goal of the campaign, contributing to Bolivia's victory.
Key Match Events: Bolivia overcame a 10-man disadvantage after 20 minutes to secure the win against Colombia.
Pre-Game Insights: Bolivia's strategic move to play home games at high altitude in El Alto provided a significant advantage.
Post-Match Reflections: The win boosted Bolivia's confidence ahead of facing Argentina in their next qualifier.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bolivia's victory marked their fourth win in the 2026 World Cup qualifiers, matching several teams on wins.
